author: Grouparoo Inc <hello@grouparoo.com>
name: @grouparoo/app-staging-config
description: A simple app to demonstrate working with the Config UI

scripts.dev: rm -f grouparoo_config.sqlite && cd node_modules/@grouparoo/core && DATABASE_URL="sqlite://grouparoo_config.sqlite" NEXT_DEVELOPMENT_MODE=true GROUPAROO_RUN_MODE="cli:config" WORKERS=0 ./bin/dev
